user.title: Ddareungi setup
user.description:
Sign in with your Ddareungi account to use the unofficial API.

- **Username/Password**: Used to log in (cookie generated automatically)
- **Update interval (seconds)**: 120 seconds recommended (too frequent polling may overload the server)
- **Station IDs**: Comma/newline separated (station number or ST code)
  - Example: `4796`, `ST-2693`
- **My location entity (optional)**: Reference point for nearby recommendations
- **Radius/Max results/Min bikes**: Nearby recommendation rules
